summary: Increases radius and duration of torches and light spells.
descriptionHtml:
-> Version History
-> Incompatibilities & Save game warnings
-> Credits & Usage


===============================================
About this mod
===============================================
This mod increases the radius and duration of torches and light spells for use in conjunction with any mod that 
makes dungeons and/or nights darker. 

The lifetime of a Torch is now infinite and it\'s radius is doubled. 
The lifetime of the light spells is increased from 1 minute to 5 minutes and it\'s radius is increased from 450 to 
1000. The cost of the light spells has remained the same. 

This mod has been uploaded to Skyrim Nexus and Steam Workshop 

===============================================
INSTALLATION:
===============================================
Extract all .esp and .esm files to the Data directory. (most users C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data) 

===============================================
KNOWN ISSUES OR BUGS:
===============================================
None

===============================================
VERSION HISTORY
===============================================
v1.0 Initial Release  		16-2-2012

===============================================
INCOMPATIBILITIES & SAVED GAME WARNINGS:
===============================================
Always make sure that you backup your existing savegame before use.

There should be no incompatibilities unless a mod changes these specific spells. Extra care has been taken that other spells 
that use the same light effect as these spells are not modified. 


===============================================
Plans for Future Versions
===============================================

Add new light spells that either last longer or have a higher radius for higher skill levels. Preventing my warrior from using 
his novice light spell as a complete replacement for a torch. 


Please give me feedback on the chosen range for the lights or if you have other ideas to improve/expand this mod.
